resources.string: In Yellowstone Nation Park there is a remote location called Fairyland that fewer people have been to than the top of mount everest.
There are 7 locations at Y.N.P. that have guest services including hotels, restaurants, etc. They also all have there own Disc Golf courses.
In the dead of winter in Y.N.P. what can the temperature drop down to?
A new mud pot appeared within 1 mile of Old Faithful geyser in the winter of 2013. What coins were found scattered around this new feature?
What two thermal features are located in Y.N.P.?
How many locations in Y.N.P have guest services?
